FragilityCurve.Description: Costing is per unit and is based upon 850 Ton.
FragilityCurve.Name: Chiller - Capacity: 750 to <1000 Ton - Equipment that is either hard anchored or is vibration isolated with seismic snubbers/restraints - Combined anchorage/isolator & equipment fragility
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Repair anchorage and concrete pad and remount equipment.

DamageState.Description: Anchorage failure & Equipment damaged beyond repair.
